text: Denis Loktev (דניס לוקטב; born 4 June 2000) is an Israeli swimmer. He competes in 100 m freestyle, 100 m medley, 200 m freestyle, 400 m freestyle, 4x100 m freestyle, 4x100m freestyle mixed, 4x200 m freestyle, 4x200 m freestyle, and 4x50 m freestyle. He won a bronze medal at the 2018 Youth Olympic Games in the men's 200 m freestyle, as well as the 2018 European Junior Swimming Championship in the men's 4x200 m freestyle. ==Swimming career== He competes in 100 m freestyle, 100 m medley, 200 m freestyle, 400 m freestyle, 4x100 m freestyle, 4x100m freestyle mixed, 4x200 m freestyle, 4x200 m freestyle, and 4x50 m freestyle."Swimming - Denis Loktev" In July 2016, he won a bronze medal at the 2016 European Junior Swimming Championships in Hódmezővásárhely, Hungary, in the men's 4x200 m freestyle. In June 2017, he won a bronze medal at the 2017 European Junior Swimming Championships in Netanya, Israel, in the men's 4x200 m freestyle. In July 2017 at the 2017 Maccabiah Games he won the gold medal in the men’s 200 m freestyle."MUREZ PICKS UP 2ND GOLD OF MACCABIAH GAMES WITH 1:59 200 FREE" In July 2018, he won a gold medal at the 2018 European Junior Swimming Championships in Helsinki, Finland, in the men's 4x200 m freestyle, and a silver medal in the men's 200 m freestyle with a 1:47.95."RUSSIA TOPS EURO JRS MEDAL COUNT, BUT LOOK OUT FOR GBR & ISRAEL""KRISTOF MILAK DOUBLES DOWN FOR GOLD ON FINAL NIGHT OF EURO JUNIORS" In October 2018 he won a bronze medal at the 2018 Youth Olympic Games in the men's 200 m freestyle."Kolesnikov and Milak at the double in the pool" - Olympic News In March 2019, he won the men’s 400 m freestyle with a 3:52.40 at the 2019 Fédération Française de Natation Golden Tour Camille Muffat in Marseille, France."HEEMSKERK REAPS 2 WINS, SHYMANOVICH MAKES HISTORY IN MARSEILLE" In April 2019, he set a new Israeli national record in the 400 m freestyle with a 3:51.45 at the Stockholm Open."A new national records to Denis Loktev -Stockholm Cup 2019" The same month he won a silver medal at the Israel Cup in the 200 m freestyle, with a 1:48.47."FRANKEL AND LOKTEV SWIM 1:48S IN 200 FREE ON DAY 3 IN ISRAEL" In May 2019 at the 2019 Speedo Grand Challenge in Irvine, California, he won a silver medal in the 400 m freestyle super-final, at 3:54.50."MCLAUGHLIN PUTS UP WORLD TOP-25 200 FR AT NOVA GRAND CHALLENGE" In July 2019 he competed in the men's 400 metre freestyle at the 2019 World Aquatics Championships. ==See also== *List of Israeli records in swimming *Israel at the Youth Olympics ==References== ==External links== * Category:2000 births Category:Living people Category:Israeli male swimmers Category:Place of birth missing (living people) Category:Swimmers at the 2018 Summer Youth Olympics Category:Competitors at the 2017 Maccabiah Games Category:Maccabiah Games medalists in swimming Category:Maccabiah Games gold medalists for Israel
title: Denis Loktev
